title: Clean up old markdown and PNG generation methods
description: Remove deprecated code after new pipeline is stable and tested: 1) Delete scripts/generate-markdown.ts (replaced by txt generation in cheatsheet-mpk), 2) Refactor scripts/generate-png.ts to remove old layout logic, 3) Delete POC/test scripts: test-fonts.ts, generate-png-optimized.ts, 4) Update mise.toml tasks to reference new generators, 5) Remove PIXEL_FONTS_RESEARCH.md and font-tests/ directory once findings are documented. title: Create markdown cheatsheet files
description: Create well-formatted markdown files for each cheatsheet with perfectly monospaced keyboard shortcuts and information. Use the MXW01_READABILITY_GUIDE.md as reference for formatting and spacing.

title: Implement Merchant Copy pixel font rendering for PNG generation
description: Implement simplified PNG generation using bitmap pixel fonts (Merchant Copy). The layout is already done in txt files (cheatsheet-mpk), so this script just needs to: 1) Read pre-laid-out .txt files, 2) Render each character using the bitmap font, 3) Apply 1-bit threshold. No layout calculations or text wrapping needed. This makes the pipeline much simpler and guarantees crisp pixel-perfect output. Depends on cheatsheet-mpk.

title: set up mise and bun CLI project
Generate PNG cheatsheet files
description: Generate optimized PNG files for each cheatsheet, formatted and sized for the MXW01 printer. Use the MXW01_READABILITY_GUIDE.md for optimization details.

title: Investigate pixel/bitmap fonts for thermal printer optimization
description: Research and test monospace pixel fonts (like Courier Prime, IBM Plex Mono, or custom bitmap fonts) for better rendering on 1-bit thermal printer output. Pixel fonts may provide crisper rendering than anti-aliased fonts. Test with current cheatsheet generation pipeline to see if they improve legibility.

title: Generate txt files with precise monospace layout instead of markdown
description: Modify generate-markdown.ts to output .txt files with precise monospace layout optimized for the thermal printer's 384px width. Each line should be exactly positioned with proper spacing and alignment to work with Liberation Mono or similar monospace fonts. This eliminates the need for layout calculations in the PNG generator since positioning is pre-computed. Output format: exact character positions, line wrapping at fixed widths, aligned columns for hotkey tables.
